QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, odf_scenarios.id odf_pk, odf_scenarios.CODE code, odf_scenarios.IS_PLAN_OF_RECORD is_plan_of_record, odf_scenarios.IS_BASELINE is_baseline, odf_scenarios.NAME name, UPDATED.FULL_NAME updated_by, odf_scenarios.DESCRIPTION description, ODF_SCENARIOS.CREATED_DATE created_date, odf_scenarios.TYPE type, ODF_SCENARIOS.LAST_UPDATED_DATE last_updated_date, odf_scenarios.ASSOCIATED_OBJECT_ID associated_object_id, CREATED.FULL_NAME created_by, odf_scenarios.SRC_SCENARIO_ID src_scenario_id from odf_scenarios odf_scenarios, srm_resources CREATED, srm_resources UPDATED where 1 = 1 and odf_scenarios.created_by = CREATED.user_id and odf_scenarios.last_updated_by = UPDATED.user_id
